title: BASIC Magazine
content:
BASIC Magazine is a fashion magazine based in Beverly Hills, CA.[1] It is a quarterly publication, founded by a fashion photographer and BASIC CEO & Editor-in-Chief Viktorija Pashuta in 2016.[2] BASIC Magazine is published by BASIC Media Company LLC and distributed Internationally.[3] BASIC Magazine is a registered trademark.[4]

According to BASIC Magazine it "is a first class visual and editorial publication that features carefully curated content with a strong independent voice." BASIC Magazine is published quarterly with pages being inspired by artists, visuals masterpieces and themes that set the tone of the issue. Different sections are included in the a magazine, ranging from latest trends to fashion and art work to projects and inspirational role models.[5]

BASIC Magazine first print edition was released in February 2016.

Its viral project Women Superheroes was highlighted on Ads of the World website.[6]
